title: Stormborn
description: Valrin was born of the sea, or so he was always told. Orphaned on a desolate island, he knows nothing of his true past and wonders of his future. . . until the unexpected arrival of a mysterious ship changes everything.  For a fleeting moment, he feels like he might have an answer to everything and then his life is suddenly ripped apart. The one person that loved him is killed protecting him and a wanted sea-captain and his misfit crew become the only hope Valrin has. If he is to survive the coming darkness, he must learn who he truly is.  But there is someone that will hunt him. Someone that will want him dead to the prevent the mere chance of what he could become. He has a destiny to unlock but will he get there before he is destroyed?
author: J.T.  Williams
